00052 /*************************
00053  * creating an own chunk for better Nifti handling (whole file handling)
00054  **************************/
00055 namespace _internal
00056 {
00057 
00058 class NiftiChunk : public data::Chunk
00059 {
00060 public:
00061     template<typename T, typename D> NiftiChunk( T *src, D del, size_t width, size_t height, size_t slices, size_t timesteps ) :
00062         data::Chunk( src, del, width, height, slices, timesteps ) {
00063         LOG( ImageIoDebug, info ) << "create NiftiChunk";
00064     }
00065 
00066     //TODO: This is really weird staff - the gcc4.2 on MAC and RedHat is complaining about
00067     // the private copy constructor because he cannot resolve the template constructor when creating NiftiChunk
00068     // e.g. in retList.push_back( _internal::NiftiChunk::makeNiftiChunk( static_cast<uint8_t *> (ni->data), del, ni->dim[1], ni->dim[2], ni->dim[3], ni->dim[4] ? ni->dim[4] : 1 )  );
00069     // That's completely crazy but this workaround is a first solution - we hope to find a better one
00070     template<typename T, typename D> static data::Chunk makeNiftiChunk( T *src, D del, size_t width, size_t height, size_t slices, size_t timesteps )  {
00071         return NiftiChunk( src, del, width, height, slices, timesteps );
00072     }
00073 
00074 private:
00075     NiftiChunk( const NiftiChunk & ); // no standard copy constructor
00076     NiftiChunk &operator=( const NiftiChunk & ); // no copy operator
00077 };// class NiftiChunk
00078 }//namespace _internal

00081 /*************************
00082  * now, the real plugin for Nifti conversion
00083  **************************/
00084 class ImageFormat_Nifti : public FileFormat
00085 {
00086     // own chunk creations, like NiftiChunk, usually having it's own deleter
00087     struct Deleter {
00088         //members
00089         nifti_image *m_pNiImage;
00090         std::string m_filename;
00091         //constructor
00092         Deleter( nifti_image *ni, const std::string &filename ) :
00093             m_pNiImage( ni ), m_filename( filename ) {}
00094 
00095         //the most important operator
00096         void operator ()( void *at ) {
00097             LOG_IF( NULL == m_pNiImage, ImageIoLog, error )
00098                     <<  "Trying to close non-existing nifti file: " << util::MSubject( m_filename );
00099             LOG( ImageIoDebug, info ) << "Closing Nifti-Chunk file " << util::MSubject( m_filename );
00100             //clean up with the function from nifti1_io.h
00101             nifti_image_free( m_pNiImage );
00102         }
00103     };
00104 protected:
00105     std::string suffixes()const {
00106         return std::string( ".nii.gz .nii .hdr" );
00107     }
00108 public:
00109     enum vectordirection {readDir = 0, phaseDir, sliceDir, indexOrigin, voxelSizeVec};
00110 
00111 
00112     std::string dialects( const std::string &filename )const {
00113         return std::string( "fsl spm" );
00114     }
00115 
00116     std::string getName()const {
00117         //TODO: wahrscheinlich sollten die Namen irgendwie so aussehen "mpg.cbs.nii"?
00118         return "Nifti";
00119     }
00120 
00121     bool tainted()const {
00122         return false;
00123     }//internal plugins are not tainted
00124 
00125     /***********************
00126      * load file
00127      ************************/
00128     int load( std::list<data::Chunk> &retList, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect )  throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00129         //read the file with the function from nifti1_io.h
00130         nifti_image *ni = nifti_image_read( filename.c_str(), true );
00131 
00132         if ( not ni )
00133             throwGenericError( "nifti_image_read() failed" );
00134 
00135         // 0.0 would mean "not in use" - so for better handling use a 1.0
00136         float scale = ni->scl_slope ? ni->scl_slope : 1.0;
00137 
00138         // TODO: at the moment scaling not supported due to data type changes
00139         if ( 1.0 != scale ) {
00140             //          throwGenericError( std::string( "Scaling is not supported at the moment. Scale Factor: " ) + util::Value<float>( scale ).toString() );
00141             LOG( ImageIoDebug, warning ) << "Scaling is not supported at the moment. Scale Factor: "  + util::Value<float>( scale ).toString();
00142         }
00143 
00144         LOG( ImageIoDebug, isis::info ) << "datatype to load from nifti " << ni->datatype;
00145         Deleter del( ni, filename );
00146 
00147         switch ( ni->datatype ) {
00148         case DT_UINT8:
00149             retList.push_back( _internal::NiftiChunk::makeNiftiChunk( static_cast<uint8_t *> ( ni->data ), del, ni->dim[1], ni->dim[2], ni->dim[3], ni->dim[4] ? ni->dim[4] : 1 )  );
00150             break;
00151         case DT_INT8:
00152             retList.push_back( _internal::NiftiChunk::makeNiftiChunk( static_cast<int8_t *>( ni->data ), del, ni->dim[1], ni->dim[2], ni->dim[3], ni->dim[4] ? ni->dim[4] : 1 ) );
00153             break;
00154         case DT_INT16:
00155             retList.push_back( _internal::NiftiChunk::makeNiftiChunk( static_cast<int16_t *>( ni->data ), del, ni->dim[1], ni->dim[2], ni->dim[3], ni->dim[4] ? ni->dim[4] : 1 ) );
00156             break;
00157         case DT_UINT16:
00158             retList.push_back( _internal::NiftiChunk::makeNiftiChunk( static_cast<uint16_t *>( ni->data ), del, ni->dim[1], ni->dim[2], ni->dim[3], ni->dim[4] ? ni->dim[4] : 1 ) );
00159             break;
00160         case DT_UINT32:
00161             retList.push_back( _internal::NiftiChunk::makeNiftiChunk( static_cast<uint32_t *>( ni->data ), del, ni->dim[1], ni->dim[2], ni->dim[3], ni->dim[4] ? ni->dim[4] : 1 ) );
00162             break;
00163         case DT_INT32:
00164             retList.push_back( _internal::NiftiChunk::makeNiftiChunk( static_cast<int32_t *>( ni->data ), del, ni->dim[1], ni->dim[2], ni->dim[3], ni->dim[4] ? ni->dim[4] : 1 ) );
00165             break;
00166         case DT_FLOAT32:
00167             retList.push_back( _internal::NiftiChunk::makeNiftiChunk( static_cast<float *>( ni->data ), del, ni->dim[1], ni->dim[2], ni->dim[3], ni->dim[4] ? ni->dim[4] : 1 ) );
00168             break;
00169         case DT_FLOAT64:
00170             retList.push_back( _internal::NiftiChunk::makeNiftiChunk( static_cast<double *>( ni->data ), del, ni->dim[1], ni->dim[2], ni->dim[3], ni->dim[4] ? ni->dim[4] : 1 ) );
00171             break;
00172         default:
00173             throwGenericError( std::string( "Unsupported datatype " ) + util::Value<int>( ni->datatype ).toString() );
00174         }
00175 
00176         // don't forget to take the properties with
00177         copyHeaderFromNifti( retList.back(), *ni );
00178         //      if ( dialect == "spm" )
00179         //      {
00180         //          boost::shared_ptr<data::MemChunk<int16_t> >
00181         //              dst( new data::MemChunk<int16_t>( ni->dim[1], ni->dim[2], ni->dim[3], ni->dim[4] ) ) ;
00182         //          retChunk->swapAlong( *dst, 0 );
00183         //          retList.push_back( *dst );
00184         //          return 1;
00185         //      }
00186         //
00187 
00188         return 1; // if there was an error, we wouldn't get here
00189     }
00190 
00191 
00192     /***********************
00193      * write file
00194      ************************/
00195     void write( const data::Image &imageOrig, const std::string &filename, const std::string &sdialect ) throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00196         const util::istring dialect( sdialect.begin(), sdialect.end() );
00197         LOG( Debug, info ) << "Writing image of size " << imageOrig.getSizeAsString() << " and type " << imageOrig.getMajorTypeName() << " as nifti";
00198 
00199         boost::filesystem::path boostFilename( filename );
00200         //copy of our image due to changing it by transformCoords
00201         isis::data::Image image( imageOrig );
00202         //default init for nifti image
00203         nifti_image ni;
00204         memset( &ni, 0, sizeof( nifti_image ) ); //set everything to zero - default value for "not used"
00205         ni.nu = ni.nv = ni.nw = 1;
00206         ni.datatype = DT_UNKNOWN;
00207         ni.data = NULL;
00208         ni.fname = const_cast<char *>( filename.c_str() );
00209         //orientation in isis LPS - but in nifti everything relative to RAS
00210         // - so let's change row/column direction and sign of indexOrigin
00211         //now we try to transform
00212         boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<float> matrix( 3, 3 );
00213         matrix( 0, 0 ) = -1;
00214         matrix( 0, 1 ) = 0;
00215         matrix( 0, 2 ) = 0;
00216         matrix( 1, 0 ) = 0;
00217         matrix( 1, 1 ) = -1;
00218         matrix( 1, 2 ) = 0;
00219         matrix( 2, 0 ) = 0;
00220         matrix( 2, 1 ) = 0;
00221         matrix( 2, 2 ) = +1;
00222         image.transformCoords( matrix );
00223         //set the props from the image to the nifti file
00224         copyHeaderToNifti( image, ni );
00225         // set filename for resulting image(s) due to Analyze vs. Nifti
00226         ni.fname = const_cast<char *>( filename.c_str() ); // header name
00227         boost::filesystem::path imgname;
00228 
00229         if ( "hdr" == extension( boostFilename ) ) {
00230             ni.nifti_type = 0; // that's ANALYZE ID
00231             imgname  =  change_extension( boostFilename, ".img" );
00232             ni.iname = const_cast<char *>( imgname.file_string().c_str() );
00233         } else {
00234             ni.nifti_type = 1; // that's NIFTI ID
00235             ni.iname = const_cast<char *>( filename.c_str() );
00236         }
00237 
00238         // FSL compatibility
00239         if ( dialect != "fsl" ) { //@todo wtf ? shouldn't that be ==
00240             //  stuffFslCompatibility(image, ni);
00241         }
00242 
00243         // copy the data to the nifti image
00244         LOG( ImageIoLog, isis::info ) << "image typeid: " << image.getMajorTypeID();
00245         LOG( ImageIoLog, isis::info ) << "image typename: " << image.getMajorTypeName();
00246 
00247         switch ( image.getMajorTypeID() ) {
00248         case data::ValuePtr<int8_t>::staticID:
00249 
00250             if ( dialect == "fsl" ) { // fsl not compatible with int8, convert to uint8
00251                 data::TypedImage<uint8_t> fslCopy( image );
00252                 ni.datatype = DT_UINT8;
00253                 copyDataToNifti<uint8_t>( fslCopy, ni );
00254                 break;
00255             }
00256 
00257             ni.datatype = DT_INT8;
00258             copyDataToNifti<int8_t>( image, ni );
00259             break;
00260         case data::ValuePtr<uint8_t>::staticID:
00261             ni.datatype = DT_UINT8;
00262             copyDataToNifti<uint8_t>( image, ni );
00263             break;
00264         case data::ValuePtr<int16_t>::staticID:
00265             ni.datatype = DT_INT16;
00266             copyDataToNifti<int16_t>( image, ni );
00267             break;
00268         case data::ValuePtr<uint16_t>::staticID:
00269 
00270             if ( dialect == "fsl" ) {
00271                 //              image.print( std::cout );
00272                 data::TypedImage<int16_t> fslCopy( image );
00273                 ni.datatype = DT_INT16;
00274                 copyDataToNifti<int16_t>( fslCopy, ni );
00275             } else {
00276                 ni.datatype = DT_UINT16;
00277                 copyDataToNifti<uint16_t>( image, ni );
00278             }
00279 
00280             break;
00281         case data::ValuePtr<int32_t>::staticID:
00282             ni.datatype = DT_INT32;
00283             copyDataToNifti<int32_t>( image, ni );
00284             break;
00285         case data::ValuePtr<uint32_t>::staticID:
00286 
00287             if ( dialect == "fsl" ) {
00288                 data::TypedImage<int32_t> fslCopy( image );
00289                 ni.datatype = DT_INT32;
00290                 copyDataToNifti<int32_t>( image, ni );
00291                 break;
00292             }
00293 
00294             ni.datatype = DT_UINT32;
00295             copyDataToNifti<uint16_t>( image, ni );
00296             break;
00297         case data::ValuePtr<float>::staticID:
00298             ni.datatype = DT_FLOAT32;
00299             copyDataToNifti<float>( image, ni );
00300             break;
00301         case data::ValuePtr<double>::staticID:
00302             ni.datatype = DT_FLOAT64;
00303             copyDataToNifti<double>( image, ni );
00304             break;
00305         default:
00306             throwGenericError( "Datatype " + image.getMajorTypeName() + " cannot be written!" );
00307         }
00308 
00309         //now really write the nifti file with the function from nifti1_io.h
00310         errno = 0; //reset errno
00311         nifti_image_write( &ni ); //write the image - in case of a failure errno should be set
00312 
00313         if ( errno )
00314             throwSystemError( errno );
00315     }
00316 
00317     /****************************************
00318      * PRIVATE
00319      ****************************************/
00320 private:
00321 
00322     void geometryFromNifti( util::PropertyValue &row, util::PropertyValue &column, util::PropertyValue &slice, const mat44 &geo, const util::fvector4 &div ) {
00323         row->castTo<util::fvector4>() = util::fvector4( geo.m[0][0], geo.m[1][0], geo.m[2][0], geo.m[3][0] ) / div[0];
00324         column->castTo<util::fvector4>() = util::fvector4( geo.m[0][1], geo.m[1][1], geo.m[2][1], geo.m[3][1] ) / div[1];
00325         slice->castTo<util::fvector4>() = util::fvector4( geo.m[0][2], geo.m[1][2], geo.m[2][2], geo.m[3][2] ) / div[2];
00326     }
00327 
00328     void copyHeaderFromNifti( data::Chunk &retChunk, const nifti_image &ni ) {
00329         util::fvector4 dimensions( ni.dim[1], ni.ndim >= 2 ? ni.dim[2] : 1,
00330                                    ni.ndim >= 3 ? ni.dim[3] : 1, ni.ndim >= 4 ? ni.dim[4] : 1 );
00331         LOG( ImageIoLog, info ) << "size of chunk " << dimensions << "/" << ni.ndim;
00332 
00333         for ( int t = 0; t < dimensions[3]; t++ ) {
00334             util::fvector4 offsets( ni.qoffset_x, ni.qoffset_y, ni.qoffset_z, 0 );
00335             //retChunk.setPropertyAs("acquisitionTime", );
00336             retChunk.setPropertyAs<uint32_t>( "acquisitionNumber", t );
00337             retChunk.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "sequenceNumber", 1 );
00338             // in nifti everything should be relative to RAS, in isis we use LPS coordinates - normally change row/column dir and sign of indexOrigin
00339             //TODO: has to be tested with different niftis - don't trust them!!!!!!!!!
00340             retChunk.setPropertyAs( "indexOrigin", util::fvector4( ni.qoffset_x, ni.qoffset_y, ni.qoffset_z, 0 ) );
00341 
00342             retChunk.setPropertyAs( "nifti/qform_code", ni.qform_code );
00343             retChunk.setPropertyAs( "nifti/sform_code", ni.sform_code );
00344             const util::fvector4 &voxel_size = retChunk.setPropertyAs( "voxelSize", getVector( ni, voxelSizeVec ) )->castToType<util::fvector4>();
00345 
00346             if( ni.sform_code ) {
00347                 geometryFromNifti(
00348                     retChunk.setPropertyAs( "rowVec", util::fvector4() ),
00349                     retChunk.setPropertyAs( "columnVec", util::fvector4() ),
00350                     retChunk.setPropertyAs( "sliceVec", util::fvector4() ),
00351                     ni.sto_xyz, voxel_size
00352                 );
00353                 LOG( Debug, info ) << "Using sto_xyz as primary orientation "
00354                                    << retChunk.propertyValue( "rowVec" ) << " " << retChunk.propertyValue( "columnVec" ) << retChunk.propertyValue( "sliceVec" );
00355 
00356                 if( ni.qform_code ) {
00357                     geometryFromNifti(
00358                         retChunk.setPropertyAs( "nifti/qrowVec", util::fvector4() ),
00359                         retChunk.setPropertyAs( "nifti/qcolumnVec", util::fvector4() ),
00360                         retChunk.setPropertyAs( "nifti/qsliceVec", util::fvector4() ),
00361                         ni.qto_xyz, voxel_size
00362                     );
00363                     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Using qto_xyz as secondary orientation "
00364                                        << retChunk.propertyValue( "nifti/qrowVec" ) << " " << retChunk.propertyValue( "nifti/qcolumnVec" ) << retChunk.propertyValue( "nifti/qsliceVec" );
00365                 }
00366             } else if( ni.qform_code ) {
00367                 geometryFromNifti(
00368                     retChunk.setPropertyAs( "rowVec", util::fvector4() ),
00369                     retChunk.setPropertyAs( "columnVec", util::fvector4() ),
00370                     retChunk.setPropertyAs( "sliceVec", util::fvector4() ),
00371                     ni.qto_xyz, voxel_size
00372                 );
00373                 LOG( Debug, info ) << "Using qto_xyz as primary orientation "
00374                                    << retChunk.propertyValue( "rowVec" ) << " " << retChunk.propertyValue( "columnVec" ) << retChunk.propertyValue( "sliceVec" );
00375             } else {
00376                 LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Neigther sform_code nor qform_code are set, using identity matrix for geometry";
00377                 retChunk.setPropertyAs( "rowVec",  util::fvector4( 1, 0, 0 ) );
00378                 retChunk.setPropertyAs( "columnVec", util::fvector4( 0, 1, 0 ) );
00379                 retChunk.setPropertyAs( "sliceVec", util::fvector4( 0, 0, 1 ) );
00380             }
00381 
00382             //now we try to transform
00383             boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<float> matrix( 3, 3 );
00384             matrix( 0, 0 ) = -1;
00385             matrix( 0, 1 ) = 0;
00386             matrix( 0, 2 ) = 0;
00387             matrix( 1, 0 ) = 0;
00388             matrix( 1, 1 ) = -1;
00389             matrix( 1, 2 ) = 0;
00390             matrix( 2, 0 ) = 0;
00391             matrix( 2, 1 ) = 0;
00392             matrix( 2, 2 ) = +1;
00393             retChunk.transformCoords( matrix );
00394             retChunk.setPropertyAs( "sequenceDescription", std::string( ni.descrip ) );
00395             retChunk.setPropertyAs( "studyDescription", std::string( ni.intent_name ) );
00396 
00397             if ( ( 2 == ni.freq_dim ) and ( 1 == ni.phase_dim ) ) {
00398                 retChunk.setPropertyAs<std::string>( "inplanePhaseEncodingDirection", "ROW" );
00399             } else if ( ( 1 == ni.freq_dim ) and ( 2 == ni.phase_dim ) ) {
00400                 retChunk.setPropertyAs<std::string>( "inplanePhaseEncodingDirection", "COL" );
00401             }
00402 
00403             retChunk.setPropertyAs( "voxelGap", util::fvector4() ); // not extra included in Nifti, so set to zero
00404             //just some LOGS
00405             LOG( ImageIoLog, info ) << "dims at all " << dimensions;
00406             LOG( ImageIoLog, info ) << "Offset values from nifti" << offsets;
00407             LOG( ImageIoLog, info ) << "FOV row/column/slice/voxelsize:"
00408                                     << retChunk.propertyValue( "rowVec" ).toString( false )
00409                                     << " / " << retChunk.propertyValue( "columnVec" ).toString( false )
00410                                     << " / " << retChunk.propertyValue( "sliceVec" ).toString( false )
00411                                     << " / " << voxel_size;
00412         }
00413 
00414         //check description for tr, te and fa and date which is written by spm8
00415         boost::regex descriptionRegex(
00416             ".*TR=([[:digit:]]{1,})ms.*TE=([[:digit:]]{1,})ms.*FA=([[:digit:]]{1,})deg\\ *([[:digit:]]{1,2}).([[:word:]]{3}).([[:digit:]]{4})\\ *([[:digit:]]{1,2}):([[:digit:]]{1,2}):([[:digit:]]{1,2}).*" );
00417         boost::cmatch results;
00418         uint16_t tr = 0;
00419         uint16_t te = 0;
00420         uint16_t fa = 0;
00421         std::string day, month, year;
00422         size_t hours, minutes, seconds;
00423         boost::gregorian::date isisDate;
00424         boost::posix_time::time_duration isisTimeDuration;
00425 
00426         if ( boost::regex_match( ni.descrip, results,  descriptionRegex ) ) {
00427             tr = boost::lexical_cast<uint16_t>( results.str( 1 ) );
00428             te = boost::lexical_cast<uint16_t>( results.str( 2 ) );
00429             fa = boost::lexical_cast<uint16_t>( results.str( 3 ) );
00430             day = boost::lexical_cast<std::string>( results.str( 4 ) );
00431             month = boost::lexical_cast<std::string>( results.str( 5 ) );
00432             year = boost::lexical_cast<std::string>( results.str( 6 ) );
00433             hours = boost::lexical_cast<size_t>( results.str( 7 ) );
00434             minutes = boost::lexical_cast<size_t>( results.str( 8 ) );
00435             seconds = boost::lexical_cast<size_t>( results.str( 9 ) );
00436 
00437             if( day.size() == 1 ) {
00438                 day.insert( 0, std::string( "0" ) );
00439             }
00440 
00441             isisTimeDuration = boost::posix_time::time_duration( hours, minutes, seconds );
00442             std::string strDate = year + "-" + month + "-" + day;
00443             isisDate = boost::gregorian::from_simple_string( strDate );
00444             boost::posix_time::ptime isisTime( isisDate, isisTimeDuration );
00445             LOG( ImageIoLog, info ) << "SPM8 description found.";
00446             retChunk.setPropertyAs<boost::posix_time::ptime>( "sequenceStart", isisTime );
00447             retChunk.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "flipAngle", fa );
00448             retChunk.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "echoTime", te );
00449             retChunk.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "repetitionTime", tr );
00450         }
00451 
00452         //if "TR=" was not found in description and pixdim[dim] == 0 a warning calls attention to use parameter -tr to change repetitionTime.
00453         if( tr == 0 && ni.pixdim[ni.ndim] == 0 ) {
00454             LOG( ImageIoLog, warning ) << "Repetition time seems to be invalid. To set the repetition time during conversion use the parameter -tr "; //@todo thet shouldn't be here
00455             retChunk.setPropertyAs<u_int16_t>( "repetitionTime", 0 );
00456         }
00457 
00458         if( !tr && ni.pixdim[ni.ndim] ) {
00459             retChunk.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "repetitionTime", ni.pixdim[ni.ndim] * 1000 );
00460         }
00461 
00462         util::fvector4 newVoxelSize = retChunk.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize" );
00463         newVoxelSize[3] = 0;
00464         retChunk.setPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize", newVoxelSize );
00465     }
00466 
00467     util::fvector4 getVector( const nifti_image &ni, const enum vectordirection &dir ) {
00468         util::fvector4 retVec( 0, 0, 0, 0 );
00469         float units; // conversion-factor to mm
00470 
00471         switch ( ni.xyz_units ) {
00472         case NIFTI_UNITS_METER:
00473             units = 1.0e3;
00474             break;
00475         case NIFTI_UNITS_MICRON:
00476             units = 1.0e-3;
00477             break;
00478         default:
00479             units = 1;
00480         }
00481 
00482         util::FixedVector<float, 4> voxel_size( ni.pixdim + 1 );
00483         voxel_size = voxel_size * units;
00484 
00485         if ( dir == voxelSizeVec )
00486             return voxel_size;
00487 
00488         if ( ni.nifti_type > 0 ) { // only for non-ANALYZE
00489             //      RotMatrix scaleMat;//method 2
00490             util::fvector4 qto, sto;
00491 
00492             //get qto
00493             for ( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00494                 qto[i] = ni.qto_xyz.m[i][dir] / voxel_size[dir];
00495             }
00496 
00497             LOG( ImageIoDebug, info ) << "Orientation red from qto_xyz:" << dir + 1 << " is " << qto;
00498 
00499             //get sto
00500             for ( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00501                 sto[i] = ni.sto_xyz.m[i][dir] / voxel_size[dir];
00502             }
00503 
00504             LOG( ImageIoDebug, info ) << "Orientation red from sto_xyz:" << dir + 1 << " is " << sto;
00505 
00506             //use one of them
00507             if ( ni.qform_code > 0 ) {// just tranform to the nominal space of the scanner
00508                 retVec = qto;
00509             } else if ( ni.sform_code > 0 ) { // method 3
00510                 retVec = sto;
00511             } else if ( ni.sform_code == 0 and ni.qform_code == 0 ) { // it seems to be an ANALYZE7.5 file
00512                 LOG( ImageIoLog, info ) << "sform_code and qform_code are 0. Trying to use qto_xyz info!";
00513                 retVec = qto;
00514             } else {
00515                 LOG( ImageIoLog, error )
00516                         << "can't read orientation Vector for direction: " << dir + 1;
00517             }
00518         }
00519 
00520         return retVec;
00521     }
00522 
00523     template<typename T>
00524     void copyDataToNifti( const data::Image &image, nifti_image &ni ) {
00525         ni.data = malloc( image.getBytesPerVoxel() * image.getVolume() );
00526         T *refNii = ( T * ) ni.data;
00527         const util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> csize = image.getChunk( 0, 0 ).getSizeAsVector();
00528         const util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> isize = image.getSizeAsVector();
00529         const data::scaling_pair scale = image.getScalingTo( data::ValuePtr<T>::staticID );
00530 
00531         for ( size_t t = 0; t < isize[3]; t += csize[3] ) {
00532             for ( size_t z = 0; z < isize[2]; z += csize[2] ) {
00533                 for ( size_t y = 0; y < isize[1]; y += csize[1] ) {
00534                     for ( size_t x = 0; x < isize[0]; x += csize[0] ) {
00535                         const size_t dim[] = {x, y, z, t};
00536                         const data::Chunk ch = image.getChunkAs<T>( scale, x, y, z, t );
00537                         T *target = refNii + image.getLinearIndex( dim );
00538                         ch.getValuePtr<T>().copyToMem( 0, ch.getVolume() - 1, target );
00539                     }
00540                 }
00541             }
00542         }
00543 
00544         // data dependent information added
00545         ni.nbyper = image.getBytesPerVoxel();
00546         std::pair<double, double> minmax = image.getMinMaxAs<double>();
00547         ni.cal_min = minmax.first;
00548         ni.cal_max = minmax.second;
00549     }
00550 
00551     void geometryToNifti( const util::fvector4 &row, const util::fvector4 &column, const util::fvector4 &slice, const util::fvector4 &offset, mat44 &geo, const util::fvector4 &factor ) {
00552         for ( int y = 0; y < 3; y++ ) {
00553             geo.m[y][0] = row[y] * factor[0];
00554             geo.m[y][1] = column[y] * factor[1];
00555             geo.m[y][2] = slice[y] * factor[2];
00556             geo.m[y][3] = offset[y];
00557         }
00558 
00559     }
00560     void copyHeaderToNifti( const data::Image &image, nifti_image &ni ) {
00561         //all the other information for the nifti header
00562         BOOST_ASSERT( data::Image::dims == 4 );
00563         ni.scl_slope = 1.0;
00564         ni.scl_inter = 0.0;// TODO: ? http://209.85.135.104/search?q=cache:AxBp5gn9GzoJ:nifti.nimh.nih.gov/board/read.php%3Ff%3D1%26i%3D57%26t%3D57+nifti-1+scl_slope&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=1&client=iceweasel-a
00565 
00566         if ( image.hasProperty( "InPlanePhaseEncodingDirection" ) ) {
00567             std::string phaseEncoding = ( image.getPropertyAs<std::string>( "InPlanePhaseEncodingDirection" ) );
00568 
00569             if ( phaseEncoding == "ROW" ) {
00570                 ni.freq_dim = 2;
00571                 ni.phase_dim = 1;
00572             }
00573 
00574             if ( phaseEncoding == "COL" ) {
00575                 ni.freq_dim = 1;
00576                 ni.phase_dim = 2;
00577             } else {
00578                 ni.freq_dim = 0;
00579                 ni.phase_dim = 0;
00580             }
00581         } else {
00582             ni.freq_dim = 1;
00583             ni.phase_dim = 2;
00584             ni.slice_dim = 3;
00585         }
00586 
00587         ni.xyz_units = NIFTI_UNITS_MM;
00588         ni.time_units = NIFTI_UNITS_MSEC;
00589         util::fvector4 dimensions = image.getSizeAsVector();
00590         LOG( ImageIoLog, info ) << dimensions;
00591         ni.ndim = ni.dim[0] = image.getRelevantDims();
00592         ni.nx = ni.dim[1] = dimensions[0];
00593         ni.ny = ni.dim[2] = dimensions[1];
00594         ni.nz = ni.dim[3] = dimensions[2];
00595         ni.nt = ni.dim[4] = dimensions[3];
00596         ni.nvox = image.getVolume();
00597         util::fvector4 rowVec = image.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "rowVec" );
00598         util::fvector4 columnVec = image.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "columnVec" );
00599         util::fvector4 sliceVec = image.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "sliceVec" );
00600         util::fvector4 indexOrigin = image.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00601 
00602         if( image.hasProperty( "nifti/qform_code" ) )
00603             ni.qform_code =  image.getPropertyAs<int>( "nifti/qform_code" );
00604 
00605         if( image.hasProperty( "nifti/sform_code" ) )
00606             ni.sform_code = image.getPropertyAs<int>( "nifti/sform_code" );
00607 
00608         // don't switch the z-AXIS!!!
00609         //indexOrigin[2] = -indexOrigin[2];
00610         LOG( ImageIoLog, info ) << indexOrigin;
00611         util::fvector4 voxelSizeVector = image.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize" );
00612         util::fvector4 voxelGap;
00613 
00614         if( image.hasProperty( "voxelGap" ) ) {
00615             voxelGap = image.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelGap" );
00616         }
00617 
00618         ni.dx = ni.pixdim[1] = voxelSizeVector[0] + voxelGap[0];
00619         ni.dy = ni.pixdim[2] = voxelSizeVector[1] + voxelGap[1];
00620         ni.dz = ni.pixdim[3] = voxelSizeVector[2] + voxelGap[2];
00621         ni.dt = ni.pixdim[4] = voxelSizeVector[3];
00622 
00623         if ( true == image.hasProperty( "sequenceDescription" ) ) {
00624             std::string descrip = ( image.getPropertyAs<std::string>( "sequenceDescription" ) );
00625             snprintf( ni.descrip, 80, "%s", descrip.c_str() );
00626         }
00627 
00628         if ( true == image.hasProperty( "StudyDescription" ) ) {
00629             std::string descrip = ( image.getPropertyAs<std::string>( "StudyDescription" ) );
00630             snprintf( ni.intent_name, 16, "%s", descrip.c_str() );
00631         }
00632 
00633         if ( image.hasProperty( "repetitionTime" ) ) {
00634             LOG( ImageIoLog, info ) << "Setting pixdim[" << ni.ndim << "] to " << image.getPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "repetitionTime" );
00635             ni.dt = ni.pixdim[ni.ndim+1] = ( float ) image.getPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "repetitionTime" ) / 1000; //nifti saves repTime s
00636         }
00637 
00638         //the rotation matrix
00639         //create space tranformation matrices - transforms the space when reading _NOT_ the data
00640         // thus ni.qto_xyz describes the orientation of the scanner space in the image space, not the orientation of image in the scanner space
00641         //      ni.sform_code = ni.qform_code = NIFTI_XFORM_SCANNER_ANAT;//set scanner aligned space from nifti1.h
00642         LOG( Debug, info ) << "rowVec " << rowVec << "  columnVec" << columnVec << "sliceVec" << sliceVec;
00643 
00644 
00645         if( ni.sform_code ) { // if sform_code was set - sform was used as geometry
00646             geometryToNifti( rowVec, columnVec, sliceVec, indexOrigin, ni.sto_xyz, voxelSizeVector + voxelGap );
00647 
00648             if( ni.qform_code ) { // if both was set - qform would be stored in "nifti/"
00649                 geometryToNifti(
00650                     image.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "nifti/qrowVec" ),
00651                     image.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "nifti/qcolumnVec" ),
00652                     image.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "nifti/qsliceVec" ),
00653                     indexOrigin, ni.qto_xyz, util::fvector4( 1, 1, 1 )
00654                 );
00655             }
00656         } else { // if only qform code was set qform was used as geometry
00657             if( !ni.qform_code ) //if none was set, default qform to NIFTI_XFORM_SCANNER_ANAT
00658                 ni.qform_code = NIFTI_XFORM_SCANNER_ANAT;
00659 
00660             geometryToNifti( rowVec, columnVec, sliceVec, indexOrigin, ni.qto_xyz, util::fvector4( 1, 1, 1 ) );
00661         }
00662 
00663         if( ni.qform_code ) {
00664             //generate matching quaternions
00665             nifti_mat44_to_quatern(
00666                 ni.qto_xyz,
00667                 &ni.quatern_b, &ni.quatern_c, &ni.quatern_d,
00668                 &ni.qoffset_x, &ni.qoffset_y, &ni.qoffset_z,
00669                 NULL, NULL, NULL,
00670                 &ni.qfac );
00671 
00672             LOG( Debug, info ) << "ni.qto_xyz:" << util::listToString( ni.qto_xyz.m[0], ni.qto_xyz.m[0] + 3 );
00673             LOG( Debug, info ) << "ni.qto_xyz:" << util::listToString( ni.qto_xyz.m[1], ni.qto_xyz.m[1] + 3 );
00674             LOG( Debug, info ) << "ni.qto_xyz:" << util::listToString( ni.qto_xyz.m[2], ni.qto_xyz.m[2] + 3 );
00675             LOG( Debug, info ) << "ni.qfac:" << ni.qfac;
00676         }
00677     }
00678 
00679 
00680 
00681 };//end class definition
00682 }
00683 }//namespace image_io isis

00685 
00686 isis::image_io::FileFormat *factory()
00687 {
00688     return new isis::image_io::ImageFormat_Nifti();
